body:
Theodore,

It sounds like you are looking at some good stuff and I am very excited to hear what you come up with.  Compiling a set of formulas would be a great resource and, if that thesis is available for download or purchase anywhere, I would love to read it.

The pointing out of the "hipness" of ABM was not meant to be a critique of it as much a wariness of the "hype cycle" that is useful to view new technologies with ([https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hype_cycle](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hype_cycle)).  I am certain that there is a huge plateau of productivity for ABM as we come to understand its most valuable applications.

-Chris
